root.name: copy()
root.description: Copies a region of pixels from one image into another. If the source and destination regions aren't the same size, it will automatically resize source pixels to fit the specified target region. No alpha information is used in the process, however if the source image has an alpha channel set, it will be copied as well.
root.syntax: img.copy(sx1, sy1, sx2, sy2, dx1, dy1, dx2, dy2); img.copy(srcImg, sx1, sy1, sx2, sy2, dx1, dy1, dx2, dy2);

parameter.label: img
parameter.description: PImage: any variable of type PImage

parameter.label: sx1
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the source's upper left corner

parameter.label: sy1
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the source's upper left corner

parameter.label: sx2
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the source's lower right corner

parameter.label: sy2
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the source's lower right corner

parameter.label: dx1
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the destination's upper left corner

parameter.label: dy1
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the destination's upper left corner

parameter.label: dx2
parameter.description: int: X coordinate of the destination's lower right corner

parameter.label: dy2
parameter.description: int: Y coordinate of the destination's lower right corner

parameter.label: srcImg
parameter.description: PImage: a image variable referring to the source image.
